loans.name: Margrait

texts.en:
Margrait is a 32-year-old vigorous lady; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community, and uses the income to support her entire family. 

However, due to a lack of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. 

For this reason she requested a loan of Rs 40,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan to buy more spools of thread in different colors, with the packs of lace, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenues so she may able to generate a healthier source of income. 

She is in her fourth loan cycle and has shown good repayment behavior.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread in different colors with packs of lace, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Ghulam  Zaineb

texts.en:
Ghulam Zaineb is a 32-year-old married woman and the mother of three children. Her husband works for daily wages and his income is not enough to support his family. 

Before starting her retail shop, Ghulam Zaineb's family often lived in a hand-to-mouth condition. She decided to support her family for a better life and to secure the future of her children. 

Ten years ago she started the retail shop to support her family. Now she has a reputable shop in her community. Her customers are satisfied and give her value due to her honesty in business. She has a very good credit behavior and has successfully completed her previous loan cycle. Now she requested a loan of PKR 45,0000 to further expend her business by purchasing stock of rice, sugar, and grains according to customer needs and for increasing the numbers of customers. She wants to use the profit from the business for her family needs and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To purchase stock of rice, sugar, and grains.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is a 34-year-old married lady who has been running a small general store in her community for many years.  She offers a variety of grocery items at reasonable prices, and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. She makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked, she requested a loan of Rs 40,000, which she will use to buy a stock of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way she would be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. 

Razia wishes to use part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy a stock of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Majidan

texts.en:
Majidan is a 55-year-old married woman, the mother of seven children. 

For eight years, Majidan has been running a business selling milk. She started her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread earner at that point in time. With the passage of time, her sales increased and also her income. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family and financial matters. 

She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 60,000 to purchase another buffalo. 

She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support. 

Majidan is in her seventh loan cycle with Kashf Foundation.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Fozia

texts.en:
Fozia is a 32-years-old married woman, and a mother of three children. She has been running a business of selling clothes for many years. She purchases a variety of clothes from the wholesale market and then resells them to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality clothes in her community. 

Fozia requested a loan of PKR 40,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy inventory of different clothes for the upcoming season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy inventory of different clothes.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
Faustina vive en la ciudad del Cusco ubicado al sur de Perú, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de ropa, artefactos y zapatos, ella sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y le va muy bien porque es una persona responsable y amigable. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más mercadería como por ejemplo casacas, camisas, faldas y otras cosas más. 

Faustina agradece por el préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Faustina lives in the city of Cusco in the south of Peru.  She's an enterprising and hardworking woman who makes a living selling clothing, artifacts, and shoes.  She's still a member of Siempre Juntos Communal Bank, and it's going very well for her because she's a responsible and friendly person.

She needs the current loan to buy coats, shirts, skirts, and other merchandise.

Faustina's grateful for the loan, which will allow her to invest in her business and grow economically.

loans.use: to buy coats, shirts, skirts, and other merchandise

loans.name: Zina

texts.en:
Zina is a farmer from Haytagh village. She lives with her husband and two grown-up sons (ages 28 and 25).

Zina keeps only one pig and cultivates wheat, potatoes and greens. Because of hard financial conditions, Zina feels very responsible for running the farm in a sustainable way and she would greatly like to enlarge it.
 
Zina has applied for this loan to be able to purchase fertilizer and potato seeds. The loan will be a big help for this hardworking woman as she will increase agricultural turnover and will gather more income. Zina hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer and potato seeds.

loans.name: Jivan

texts.en:
Jivan is 49 years old and he lives in the village of Zovaber in the Gegharkunik region. Jivan is married and he has a son and a daughter. For several years Jivan worked as a locksmith, but in 2005 he fully became engaged in farming and agriculture. He does all the work around his farm with the help of his nice family, especially his son helps him in his farming activities very much. 

In his farm he has two cows, two calves, four sheep, two lambs and ten chickens. Jivan’s wife perfectly makes and sells Armenian national testy cheese named chanakh, and also macun (a national dairy-product), milk, meat and eggs. On his plot of land Jivan and his son cultivate potatoes, greens and tomatoes and they sell part of it to re-sellers. 

As a father, Jivan has a very important mission to do for his son. His son is engaged and now he is going to get married. Jivan feels a duty to organize a nice and gorgeous wedding party according to Armenian national traditions, and for these activities he needs financial support in an amount of 700,000 Armenian drams to organize it properly and nicely.

loans.use: to organize a nice and gorgeous wedding party according to Armenian national traditions.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a 50-year-old married woman. She is the mother of five children. 

She has been in the clay pot business for the past 30 years with her son. She makes various types and styles of clay pots. She generally uses a hand spinning tool to prepare her pots, which is a very time-consuming process. 

Now she has decided to use electric machines to increase productivity and quality. Therefore she is applying for a loan of PKR 40,000 from Kashf Foundation. She is in her fourth loan cycle with very good credit history. She wants to introduce her products to nearby cities, which will ultimately help in generating more profits.

loans.use: To buy an electric machine to prepare her pots.

loans.name: Maria Estela

texts.es: Maria Estela es originaria de la ciudad de Managua, casada. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comida y venta de cosméticos. Se siente agradecida con KIVA y MiCrédito ya que ha logrado comprar artículos de uso en ambos negocios. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Artículos escolares tales como: Lapiceros, Cuadernos, Libretas, Borradores, Reglas etc. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá obtener mayores ingresos para sustentar sus gastos.
texts.en: Maria Estela is from the city of Managua and is married. She is a businesswoman who sells food and cosmetics. She is grateful for Kiva and MiCrédito because she has been able to buy goods for both businesses. She is now requesting a loan to buy school supplies including pencil holders, notebooks, notepads, erasers and rulers. She believes that this loan will be of great help to her because she will be able to obtain greater earnings to cover her expenses.

loans.use: to buy school supplies like pencil holders, notebooks, notepads, erasers, and rulers.

loans.name: Suzanne Therese

texts.fr: Suzanne est une femme de 44 ans mariée mère de 6 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 6 et 22 ans. Quatre d'entre eux vont encore à l'école. Elle a ouvert un restaurant qu'elle gère depuis un an. c'est grâce à lui qu'elle s'occupe de sa famille. Le fait d'acheter les produit de restauration en détail ne rapporte vraiment grand chose pour elle. D'où l'importance de ce crédit pour son activité parce que ça lui permettra d'augmenter le stock de ses denrées alimentaires (sacs de d'arachide, 1 sac de riz et le petit nécessaire pour cuisiner ses plats), ainsi, que les casiers de boissons. Cela lui évitera les déplacements quotidiens et diminuera ses frais de taxi, ça augmentera aussi ses bénéfices. Elle réinvestira une partie de ce profit pour agrandir son restaurant, l'autre l'aidera à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Suzanne is a 44 year-old woman who is married and the mother of 6 children aged between 6 and 22. Four of her children still go to school. She has been running a restaurant for a year. It is thanks to her business that she is able to take care of her family. She is not able to make a large profit because she has to buy her ingredients retail, which is why this loan is important to her, as it will enable her to increase her inventory of food (bags of groundnuts, one bag of rice and other ingredients she needs to prepare her meals). Buying in bulk will enable her to avoid having to travel every day and will decrease her taxi expenses, as well as increasing her profits. She will reinvest part of her profit in her business so that she can expand her restaurant and the rest will allow her to meet her family's needs.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of food.

loans.name: Ibrahima

texts.fr: Ibrahima habite au sud du Sénégal,marié âgé de 28 ans père de 3 enfants deux garçons et une fille.Deux enfants sont à l'école le plus petit est âgé de 1 an reste à la maison auprès de sa maman .Ibrahima,étais dans l'armée d’où il a été libérer il y'a 3 ans et voila depuis deux an,il pratique le commerce de fruits pour nourrir sa petite famille ,paye les frais scolaires de ses enfants.Il épargne toujours de l’argent pour ouvrier une boutique dans l'avenir dans son quartier et faire associer sa femme dans son commerce.
texts.en: Ibrahima lives in southern Senegal. He is 28 years old, married and the father of three children, two boys and one girl. Two of his children go to school. The youngest is just 1 year old and stays at home with his mother. Ibrahima was in the army until he was liberated 3 years ago. He has been selling fruit for the past 2 years so that he can feed his family and cover his children's education expenses. He saves some of his money so that, in the coming years, he can open a shop in his district and his wife can also work in the business.

loans.use: to buy fruit for resale.

loans.name: Eugenie Françoise

texts.fr: Eugénie est une dame âgée de 38 ans, fiancée et mère de 01 enfant de 8 ans qui va à l'école. Comme activité, elle dispose d'une vente à emporter- resto dans un quartier de la ville de 02 ans environ. Elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. Elle voudrait avec ce crédit pour augmenter les casiers de boisson ainsi le stock des denrées alimentaires pour son restaurant. Ceci pour  augmenter son chiffre d'affaire ainsi que son bénéfice. Les revenus générés lui permettront de mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille. Elle a comme ambitions pour son activité de faire dans la vente en gros des boissons.
texts.en: Eugénie is a 38-year-old woman who is engaged and the mother of an 8-year-old child who attends school. She has been running a restaurant and takeaway in a district of town for about 2 years. She has good experience in her line of work. She would like this loan so that she can increase the inventory of drink and food for her restaurant, which should increase her turnover and her profits. The revenue generated by her business will enable her to better meet her family's needs. Her business goal is to become a drinks wholesaler.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of food and drink.

loans.name: Salomat

texts.ru:
Саломат жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и имеет троих сыновей. Живёт Саломат в небольшом сельском городке. Муж Саломат работает в местной мастерской. Саломат с детства училась различному рукоделию от своей матери, и на сегодня она умеет очень много. Она вышивает различные национальные узоры и продаёт свои изделия. Три сына Саломат поехали на заработки в Россию, и присылают по возможности денежные средства домой.

Чтобы иметь постоянный хороший доход, Саломат открыла свою продовольственную точку. Она продаёт разные хозяйственные товары для быта, национальные сундуки, а также национальные узоры, которые делает сама. Вот уже как с 2006 года она сотрудничает с Арванд, на полученный кредит  она начала свой бизнес, и очень благодарна за предоставленную ей возможность начать и развивать свой бизнес. Вот и сейчас Саломат хочет расширить ассортимент своего товара, поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку хозяйственных товаров для реализации. Саломат заранее благодарна Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Salomat is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She is married and has three sons. Salomat lives in a small rural village. Salomat's husband works in a local workshop. Since childhood, Salomat learned different handicrafts from her mother, and today she knows quite a lot. She embroiders various national stitchwork and sells her creations. Salomat's three sons left for work abroad in Russia, and send money home when they are able.

In order to have a steady good income, Salomat opened her own market stall. She sells different household goods for life, national trunks, and also national stitchwork, which she makes herself. Since 2006, she has been collaborating with Arvand. With the loan received, she started her own business, and she is very grateful for the opportunity to start and develop her business.

Here and now Salomat wants to expand the assortment of her inventory, therefore she applied to Arvand and wants to receive a loan to purchase household goods to sell. Salomat thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to purchase household goods

loans.name: Tereza

texts.es:
Tereza se dedica a la preparacion y venta de comida ,su elaboración y calidad optima en su presentación final de un plato con alimentos de buena calidad y al gusto del cliente.

Ella vive en casa propia en La Paz, aproximadamente a una hora del centro de la ciudad de La Paz.

El sueño de Tereza es abrir un restaurante de alto renombre e incluso llevar a pedidos.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera  vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Tereza works in the preparation and sale of well prepared, quality food with quality ingredients that customers love. 
She lives in her own house in La Paz, approximately one hour away from the downtown area of the city of La Paz. 
Tereza's dream is to open a restaurant of prestige, and even deliver food orders. It is the first time she is requesting a loan together with IMPRO and the first time with KIVA.

loans.use: To get working capital for her business in food sale (to buy plates, food items, etc)

loans.name: Freddy

texts.es: Don Freddy de 38 años de edad, es de profesión carpintero y albañil, labor que ejerce en la actualidad para ganarse la vida, su esposa es ama de casa, se encarga del orden del hogar  y el cuidado de sus dos hijos de las edades de 16 y 14 años quienes  asisten a la escuela. Freddy requiere de este crédito para comprar materiales y construir el muro perimetral de su vivienda, esta inversión será de mucha importancia para el y su familia  ya que habitan en  una zona vulnerable por la delincuencia.
texts.en:
38-year-old Don Freddy is a carpenter and bricklayer.  This is work that he does in order to earn a living.  His wife is a housewife; she is in charge of the order of the home and the care of their two children who are 14 and 16 years old and attend school.  

Freddy needs this loan in order to buy materials to build a perimeter wall around their house.  This investment will be of great importance to him and his family because they live in an area vulnerable to crime.

loans.use: to buy blocks, stone tiles, cement, iron, sand, and fastening wire.

loans.name: Natig

texts.en:
Natig is 35 years old, married with three children. Natig’s family are Internally Displaced Persons - IDP from occupied territory Agdam city and now live in Absheron region. One of his children is going to fifth class of school, another is a 10-year-old girl who goes to third class, and his little son is going to preparation class. Natiq needs a loan in the amount of 600 Azerbaijan New Manat (AZN) to repair his car’s interior. 

This is Natig’s second loan; previously he took a loan from Kiva and that loan stimulated his business. Then he changed his car and increased his business nicely. Natig is thankful to Kiva and all lenders for everything.

loans.use: to repair the interior of the car

loans.name: Siriam

texts.es:
Siriam es una persona responsable que se dedica a realizar impresiones de documentos y que pertenece al banco comunal "Siempre Juntos". Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. Ella en esta oportunidad requiere otro crédito para incrementar su capital de negocio entonces desea comprar papel y tinta.
 
Siriam está feliz por el otro préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de sua cuotaa.

Este préstamo es parte de la "Programa Yapa" a la Asociación Arariwa, que permite los prestatarios con un buen historial de reembolsos a recibir un especial préstamo producto: un pequeño préstamo, además de su préstamo regular, que tiene un calendario de pagos flexible de cuatro meses.
texts.en:
Siriam is a responsible person who works printing documents. She belongs to the communal bank “Siempre Juntos” [“Always Together”]. She has worked at this business for many years now and it is doing well. She is requesting this additional loan to increase the capital of her business by buying paper and ink.

Siriam is happy for this additional loan, and she promises to make her loan payments.

The loan is part of the "Yapa Program" of Asociación Arariwa that allows borrowers with a good credit and repayment history to receive a special loan product: a small loan, in addition to their regular loan, that has a flexible loan schedule of four months.

loans.use: to buy paper and ink.

loans.name: Maman Lève Toi Group

texts.fr: La cliente est une brave commerçante et membre du collectif d’affaires « Maman lève toi », senior entrepreneur, dynamique, âgée de 49 ans, mariée et mère de 7 enfants, qui tous étudient. La cliente est vendeuse de la boisson. Elle installe sa marchandise dans une buvette à son domicile dans un quartier animé de la ville, où, elle a su gagner sa clientèle. Elle commença ses affaires avec le premier capital reçu de sa famille biologique. Plus tard,elle bénéficia le prêt de l’IMF Hekima. Il y a 10 ans qu’elle exerce cette activité. Son conjoint est un enseignant dans une école publique. Ce nouveau prêt va la servir d’acheter 50 caisses de fanta sucré, 50 caisses de bière Primus, etc. Ainsi, elle souhaite construire une belle maison, scolariser et nourrir ses enfants. Au finish, elle remercie fortement Hekima pour l’autonomisation des petits entrepreneurs exclus du système bancaire classique, surtout; pendant ce moment difficile post conflits dans la région de l’Est du pays.
texts.en:
This client is a good and honest merchant and a member of the business collective "Mama lève toi". An energetic senior entrepreneur, she is 49 years old and the married mother of seven children, all students. This client is a vendor of drinks. She sets up her merchandise in a refreshment stand at her house in a busy district in town where she figured out how to earn customers. She started her business with initial capital from her blood relatives. Later on, she benefited from a loan from the microfinance institution Hekima. She has been in this business for ten years. Her husband is a public school teacher. 

This new loan will be used to purchase 50 cases of Fanta softdrink, 50 cases of Primus beer, etc. She would thus like to build a nice house and provide schooling and food for her children.

In conclusion, she thanks Hekima very much for promoting autonomy among small-scale entrepreneurs excluded from the traditional banking system, especially during this difficult time post-conflict in the country's east.

loans.use: to purchase cases of Fanta softdrink and Primus beer to sell

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna lives in Mrgavet village with her husband and her husband's family. Anna's husband works at local company. His salary alone isn't enough for covering the family's costs, so Anna and other family members run a farm. They keep a greenhouse where different vegetables are cultivated and also own an orchard where fruits are grown. 

Anna works hard to help her husband with sustaining the family so she would greatly like to enrich her farm. She has applied for this loan of USD 1,800 to be able to renovate the greenhouse and purchase fertilizer and fuel for land cultivation. The loan is very important for Anna and her family and she hopes that Kiva lenders will support her.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of her greenhouse, fertilizer, and fuel for land cultivation

loans.name: Rakhilya

texts.ru: Рахиля работящая сельская женщина из района Шахритус. Ей 41 год. Она многодетная мать - у нее пятеро детей. Рахиля и ее муж занимаются животноводством. Они начали данный бизнес 10 лет назад и по сей продолжают его. Доход с продажи скота является главным источником дохода семьи. Сейчас в их хозяйстве осталось всего пару скотов. Рахиля обратилась за кредитом, чтобы увеличить поголовье крупнорогатого скота. На сумму от кредита она собирается приобрести одну корову. Рахиля ждет поддержки.
texts.en:
Rakhilya is a working rural woman from the Shahrituz region. She is 41 years old. She is the mother of many children - she has five children. Rakhilya and her husband raise livestock. She started this business ten years ago and still continues this work. Income from the sale of livestock is the chief source of income for the family.

Now on the homestead, there remain only a few cattle. Rakhilya applied for a loan in order to increase the cattle count. With the loan sum, she intends to purchase one cow. Rakhilya is awaiting support.

loans.use: to purchase one cow to increase her livestock count

loans.name: Perpetue Evelyne

texts.fr: perpétue est une dame âgée de 46 ans, mariée et mère de 01 enfant de 17 ans qui va à l'école. Comme activité, elle dispose d'une vente à emporter- resto dans un quartier de la ville de 10 ans environ. Elle bénéficie d'une bonne expérience dans le domaine. Elle voudrait avec ce crédit pour augmenter les casiers de boisson ainsi le stock des denrées alimentaires pour son restaurant. Ceci pour augmenter son chiffre d'affaire ainsi que son bénéfice. Les revenus générés lui permettront de mieux subvenir aux besoins de la famille. Elle a comme ambitions pour son activité de faire dans la vente en gros des boissons.
texts.en: Perpétue is a 46-year-old woman who is a married mother of a 17-year-old child, who is in school. For work, Perpétue has had a take-out restaurant in a district in town for about ten years. She benefits from good experience in this domain. With this loan, she would like to increase her cases of drinks, as well as her stock of food supplies for her restaurant. This will increase her sales, as well as her profits. The profits generated will enable her to do better at meeting family needs. Her ambition for her business to sell beverages in bulk.

loans.use: to increase her stock of drinks, as well as food supplies for her restaurant

loans.name: Gulnigor

texts.ru: Ее зовут Гулнигор. Она уроженка района Хуросон. Гулнигор замужем и вместе с мужем воспитывают сына. Гулнигор 15 лет своей жизни потратила на деятельность животноводства. В Таджикистане основным видом деятельности является животноводства и растениеводства. Гулнигор научилась ухаживать за скотами в юном возрасте, в родительском доме. По сей день свои знания и опыт она использует в бизнесе. У нее не много скотов и она решила увеличить количество скотин на скотном дворе, чтобы расширить бизнес и увеличить доходность от деятельности. Но для купли достаточного количества телят, у нее не хватает средств, по этой причине она обратилась за кредитом  с надеждой на помощь.
texts.en:
Her name is Gulnigor. She is native to the Khuroson region. Gulnigor is married and with her husband has brought up one son. Gulnigor has spent 15 years of her life raising livestock. In Tajikistan, the main types of activity are raising livestock and crops. Gulnigor learned to care for cattle at a young age in her parents' home.

To this day, she uses her knowledge and experience in this work. She has not many cattle and she decided to expand the quantity of cattle in her barnyard, in order to expand her business and increase income from activities. But she does not have enough money to buy a sufficient number of calves, and for this reason she applied for a loan with the hope of getting help.

loans.use: to purchase cattle in order to increase her livestock count

loans.name: Kusar

texts.en: Kusar, 27, is a married woman and mother of four children. The man shown in the photo is Kusar’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. For this reason, Kusar has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR for her husband. He wants to buy new tires and buckets of paint for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. Kusar is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires and buckets of paint.

loans.name: Tahira

texts.en: Tahira is a 41-year-old married woman. She has been running a business manufacturing iron rods for many years with the support of her husband. She purchases iron in scrap form and after mending it sells it in the local market; buyers use her products to make furniture. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. Currently, she is applying for a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase iron material in a large quantity along with some cutters. She is in her 4th loan cycle and has a good repayment history. She wishes to spend part of her profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase iron material in a large quantity along with some cutters.

loans.name: Louise

texts.fr: Louise est  une jeune femme de 52 ans mariée mère de 4 enfants. Après sa formation, elle a ouvert un petit atelier de couture qui fonctionne bien depuis des années, elle fait aussi le surfilage mais n'a pas tout le matériel pour aller plus vite avec ses commandes et pouvoir satisfaire sa clientèle à temps. C'est pour celà qu'elle sollicite un crédit pour s'acheter des tissus et le petit matériel de mercerie (épingles, aiguilles, doublure, fil...) qui l'évitera d'aller au marché tout le temps, elle pourra coudre et revendre à ses clients. Le bénéfice tiré de ce crédit lui permettra non seulement de s'acheter son petit matériel de couture pour agrandir son activité, mais aussi de satisfaire certains de ses besoins ainsi que ceux de sa famille.
texts.en: Louise is a young woman, 52 years old, and the married mother of four. After completing her training, she opened a small sewing workshop, which has been doing well for years. She also does overcasting but does not have all the supplies and equipment to fulfill special orders quickly and satisfy her customer on a timely basis. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to purchase some cloth and sundry sewing supplies (needles, pins, lining, thread, …), so that she can avoid having to go to the market all the time. She will be able to sew items and sell them to her customers. The profits from this loan will enable her not only to purchase her various sewing supplies to expand her business but also to meet certain of her needs, as well as those of her family.

loans.use: to purchase cloth and sewing supplies

loans.name: Sadiqan

texts.en:
Sadiqan is a 57-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her son (also shown in the photo) who assists her by purchasing her stock of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. She is a mother of two children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and healthcare. 

Sadiqan wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 50,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demand in her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future. She is in her 6th loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages

loans.name: Anwar Sultana

texts.en:
Anwar Sultana is a 58-year-old married woman, living in the area of Rawalpindi, Pakistan. She is the mother of two sons and two daughters. Her husband owns an electronics shop in which he offers televisions and LCD TVs on installments. He sells brands of TVs and LCD TVs such as Sony, Samsung, LG, Nobel and Panasonic. He also offers one-year warranty for those electronics products. 

Her husband wants to grow his business and wants to offer more electronics to his customers but he does not have enough capital for investment. So Anwar Sultana requested a loan from BRAC Pakistan, the field partner of Kiva. Through this loan her husband will buy more electronics products to sell on installments.

 Anwar Sultana is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy branded TVs, washing machines, LCDs, etc. for electronics shop

loans.name: Nilufar

texts.ru:
Двадцати восьмилетняя Нилуфар является матерью одиночкой. Она живет в районе Шахритус и одна воспитывает троих детей. Несколько лет назад Нилуфар развелась с мужем. Чтобы прокормить себя и маленьких детей, она с помощью родственников открыла свой торговый бизнес. Уже 7 лет как Нилуфар на рынке района занимается продажей детской одежды. Она довольна своим бизнесом, так как за счет него она продвигает жизнь. 
В данный момент Нилуфар хочет увеличить товарооборот и с такой целью обратилась за кредитом. Она за счет кредита планирует привести ассортимент сезонной детской одежды для перепродажи. В будущем Нилуфар хочет расширить свою торговую точку.
texts.en:
28-year-old Nilufar is a single mother. She lives in the Shahrituz region and is raising three children on her own. Several years ago, Nilufar divorced her husband. In order to feed herself and the small children, she opened her own trade business with the help of her relatives. For seven years already, Nilufar has been selling children's clothing in the local market. She is pleased with her business, since through it she is advancing her life.

Currently, Nilufar wants to increase her inventory and with this aim applied for a loan. With the loan, she plans to purchase a variety of seasonal children's clothing for resale. In the future, Nilufar wants to expand her trading stall.

loans.use: to purchase seasonal children's clothing to develop trade

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer La Rinconada Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NUEVO AMANECER LA RINCONADA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Andahuaylillas, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Isabel; ella tiene 37 años de edad es casada y tiene 06 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, gallinas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
  La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes para su negocio.
Los otros socios  se dedican la agricultura, ganadería, crianza de animales.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The members of this group belong to the communal bank “NUEVO AMANECER LA RINCONADA”. This bank is located in the district of Andahuaylillas, in the province of Quispicanchis and the department of Cusco.

Isabel is one of the members of this group. She is 37 years old, married, and has six children. She manages both her daily household work and her business of raising small animals, such as guinea pigs and chickens. She has had this business for some time now, and it is doing well thanks to the hard work and dedication she puts into it every day. She raises these small animals to then sell them to her customers. She would like to continue working so that she can continue to support her family. She is requesting this loan to buy guinea pigs for her business.

The other members work in agriculture, raising livestock and other animals.

Isabel is happy for this loan, and she promises to make her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es: Maria Cristina es originaria de Granada, soltera. Tiene 23 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Inicio su negocio con la venta de pocos productos y luego con un préstamo de una financiera cercana fue obteniendo una diversidad de productos para ofrecerles a sus clientes. Su meta próxima es ampliar el negocio con una diversidad de productos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Arroz, Azúcar, Aceite, Frijoles entre otros. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá incrementar su inventario y así obtener mejores ganancias. Su plan futuro es ampliar el local donde ofrece sus productos.
texts.en: Maria Cristina is a native of Granada and is single. She is 23 years old. She is a merchant and has a small grocery store. She started her business by selling a few products, and then with a loan from a nearby finance company, she gradually built up a variety of products to offer to her customers. Her next goal is to increase the size of her business by adding a greater variety of products. She is requesting this loan to buy rice, sugar, oil and beans, among others. She thinks that the loan will be a lot of help to her, since she will be able to increase her inventory and improve her profits. Her plan for the future is to increase the size of the premises where her business is located.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, oil and beans for her small grocery store.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.es:
Lorena es una joven de 18 años que vive en Bogota, siempre se ha caracterizado por ser una mujer muy independiente y llena de valores excepcionales,  con una gran capacidad de escuchar y gran disposición para dar lo mejor de ella en las actividades diarias, desde muy joven ha trabajado para conseguir las cosas y así poder pagar los estudios y demás necesidades. 
Actualmente se encuentra trabajando en el día y estudiando en la noche, segundo semestre de la carrera de enfermería en el instituto campo alto, los ingresos monetarios no le alcanzan para suplir todas las necesidades, debido a esto esta solicitando la ayuda de kiva ya que desea terminar los dos semestres restantes de la carrera, esto es muy importante para ella por que así podrá aspirar a un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Lorena is a young woman, 18 years old, who lives in Bogota. She has always been characterized as a very independent woman, full of exceptional values, with a great capacity for listening and a grand disposition to give her best in daily activities. Since she was very young she has worked to achieve things and, thus, to be able to pay for her studies and other necessities.

At present, Lorena is working during the day and studying at night in her 2nd semester of nursing in the Campo Alto Institute.  Her monetary income doesn't enable her to cover all her necessities. For this reason, Lorena is requesting Kiva's help to complete her 2 remaining semesters of nursing school. This is very important for Lorena so that she will be able to aspire to a better future.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her remaining semesters of nursing school.

loans.name: Mercedes Andrea

texts.es: Mercedes Andrea mayor de edad casada con hijos mayores e independientes, originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, se caracteriza por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y con muchos deseos de superación personal, por falta de recursos económicos no logro cursar una carrera universitaria, debido a que desde muy joven comenzó a trabajar para ayudar con los gastos del hogar, hoy en día gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y deseos de salir adelante decide poner una pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitación donde ofrece productos de consumo diario como: arroz, azúcar, leche, frijoles, pan, papel higiénicos, huevos, detergentes, café, sal, productos congelados, gaseosas, jugos, golosinas, shampoo entre otros, sus compras las realiza al contado a camiones repartidores y distribuidoras ubicadas en el mercado de ese municipio, tiene clientes fijos y eventuales, da al crédito recuperando semanalmente, Mercedes abre sus puertas a sus clientes desde muy temprano cerrando algo tarde para ofrecerles un mejor servicios a sus clientes. el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su pulperia en la compra de productos de consumo como: granos básicos, productos congelados, golosinas entre otros y de esa manera satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y en obtener mayores ingresos.-
texts.en:
Mercedes Andrea is married with children, who are now adults and independent. She is a native of one of the municipalities of Chinandega, which is located in the west of the country. She is known for being hardworking, responsible, and for having a strong desire to better herself. She was unable to go to university because of a lack of financial resources. For this reason, she started to work when she was very young to help with household expenses.

Today, thanks to her enterprising spirit and desire to get ahead, she is starting a small grocery store located in her home. She will sell everyday products like rice, sugar, milk, beans, bread, toilet paper, eggs, detergent, coffee, salt, frozen foods, soft drinks, juices, candy and shampoo, among others. She makes her purchases in cash from delivery trucks and distributors located in the market of her municipality. She has both regular and occasional customers, and gives credit collecting payments weekly. She opens her doors to customers very early and closes rather late to offer the best service.

Her goal with this loan is to invest in the capital of her business by acquiring stock for her store. She plans to buy everyday products such as basic grains, frozen foods and candy, among others. She hopes to satisfy the needs of her customers and improve her income.

loans.use: to buy everyday products such as basic grains, frozen foods and candy for her small grocery store.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur lives in the village of Gugark in Lori region. Artur is 38 years old. He is married and he has two school-aged sons. He is the only one in the household who makes money  to support the family. He sells fruits and vegetables and he works without holidays. He sells different sorts of apples, grapes, pears, lemons, oranges, bananas, potatoes, greens, etc. As he says, the profit from the sale of fruits and vegetables is not very big, since sometimes the variety of products is not great, but anyway it is the only source of income which helps to meet his family's basic needs. All the products are bought from the Vanadzor wholesale market from villagers and re-sellers. 

Now Artur is asking for a loan of 200,000 Armenian drams in order to buy products for his stall such as carrots, tomatoes, greens, oranges, persimmons and mandarins.

loans.use: to buy products for his stall such as carrots, tomatoes, greens, oranges, persimmons and mandarins

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is 30 years old, a married woman. She has been knitting sweaters and caps for many years. She works hard on her knitting every day so she can earn a living for her family and provide food, healthcare, and education. 

Amina is requesting her fourth loan from Kashf Foundation for Rs. 40,000, which she will use to purchase bundles of wool and thread in different colors along with packs of needles. With the loan, she hopes to increase her sales. She wishes to spend part of the profits on providing a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wool and thread in different colors along with packs of needles.

loans.name: Fe Y Esperanza Group

texts.es: El G.S. Fe y Esperanza está conformado por cuatro integrantes que son: Maria Cristina, Rosa Argentina, Carolina y Mariana Bernarda, todas originarias de uno de los municipios del Norte de  Chinandega,el cual esta ubicado en el occidente del pais, y se caracteriza por ser una zona comercial productiva todas ellas se conocen por lo que son de la misma zona por lo que optaron en realizar un crédito en grupo solidario, y de esa manera poder ayudarse económicamente invertir en sus diferentes negocios. María Cristina quien la coordinadora del grupo en el cual ella se encarga de la responsabilidad, y el cumplimiento de pagos en tiempo y forma tiene por actividad económica la producción y venta de tortillas desde muy temprano se levanta a realizar este producto de consumo para satisfacer a sus clientes, sus compras las realiza al contado sus ventas también son al contado en su casa de habitación, el financiamiento lo quiere para invertir en su negocio en la compra de maíz, leña, cal, gas entre otros y de esa manera satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.-
texts.en:
The G.S. Fe y Esperanza is made up of four members: Maria Cristina, Rosa Argentina, Carolina, and Mariana Bernarda. All of them are from one of the towns in the north of Chinandega which is located in the west of the country. The zone is characterized by its being a commercial zone. All the women met because they are from the same zone and chose to get a loan in a mutually supportive group, and in that way be able to help themselves economically to invest in their different businesses. 
 
Maria Cristina who is the coordinator of the group and has the responsibility of making the payments on time has an economic activity of making and selling tortillas. She wakes up very early to make this product to satisfy her clients. She makes her purchases in cash and her sales in cash too in her house. She wants the funding to invest in her business in the purchasing corn, firewood, lime powder, and gas among other things and in this way satisfy the demand of her clients.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood, gas, and lime powder among other things.

loans.name: Mauricio De Jesús

texts.es:
Mauricio de 24 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado de educación básica, está acompañado su pareja le ayuda con el trabajo agrícola y con las vacas,  tienen dos hijos de 3 y dos años de edad.
Mauricio trabaja la tierra y la ganadería, cultiva maíz trabajo que y ha sido el sustento de su familia, lo aprendió con su padre ya que su familia siempre ha trabajado la agricultura y la ganadería.
Necesita el crédito,  para la compra de cerdos y trabajar la tierra, sembrar maíz,  compra de abono y fertilizantes.
Él sueña con seguir trabajando con créditos más grandes,  para comprar más ganado y sembrar mas, para que su familia tenga más y mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Mauricio is 24 years old. He studied up to Grade 3 in Primary school. He lives in a common-law relationship and has two children aged 2 and 3. His wife helps him with the farm work and the cows. Mauricio works the land and raises livestock, growing corn which provides for his family. He learned from his father, his family always having been in agriculture and raising livestock. 

Mauricio needs the loan to buy pigs and to work the land, growing corn and buying fertilizer and manure. He dreams of continuing to work with larger loans to buy more livestock and plant more so that his family has more and better income.

loans.use: to buy pigs and work the land growing corn, buying fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Sameena

texts.en:
Ms. Sameena is a 50-year-old, married woman. She is running a boutique at her home. Sameena buys clothes of different fabrics, in various colors and designs, from the market at wholesale rates and then stitches these clothes and sells the stitched clothes to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and she is able to earn enough money through her business. Her daughters helped her in this business. 

Sameena is requesting a PKR 60,000 loan from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her inventory. Sameena expects a boost in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of clothes in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna lives in Yeraskh village of Ararat region. She lives together with her husband and three children (ages 12, 11 and 4 years old). Together with her husband, Anna has been involved in agriculture for five years. Specifically the farm that they run includes cows, sheep and chickens. Anna also cultivates watermelons and sells them in local open markets during the summer season.

The barn where Anna keeps the livestock is too old and it is very difficult for Anna to continue keeping animals there. So, she has decided to ask for financial support from Kiva lenders to renovate the barn. The loan of USD 2,500 will also be used in purchasing forage for feeding the cattle. Anna hopes for lenders' goodwill.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the barn and forage for the livestock

loans.name: Zaitoon

texts.en:
Ms. Zaitoon is a 55-year-old married woman. She is running a boutique at her home. Zaitoon buys different fabrics in various colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then stitches this cloth and sells stitched clothes to the people of her community. She has a good clientele in the community and is able to earn enough through her business.  

Zaitoon is requesting a loan of PKR 60,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a wide variety of lengths of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business. She expects an increase in her earnings with her loan and she plans to spend part of her profits for the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: To buy a wide variety of lengths of cloth in different colors and designs

loans.name: Mais

texts.en:
Mais is married and has two children. He is 36 years old. Mais’s son is going to fourth class of school. He is athletic, and in the future wants to be a famous judo fighter. Mais’s daughter is going to third class. His wife is a housewife and helps Mais on his business. They are IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from the occupied zone of Djabrail city. Now Mais’s family is living at a hostel for refugees, which is located in Abseron region. 

Mais has poultry. He buys a lot of chickens, raises them, and sells them and their eggs at a local bazaar. Today he needs a loan to buy more chickens for his family business. He has applied to Komak Company for a loan in the amount of 2,000 AZN. He says he is thankful to Kiva and all of the lenders for help. In the future he wants to buy a big and nice flat.

loans.use: to buy more chickens

loans.name: Kubran

texts.en:
Ms. Kubran is 54 years old and married. She is an enthusiastic lady who has been making wooden baskets at home for many years. She sells them in the fruit markets. She makes a wide range of baskets from different materials. Kubran's contribution to the family income is enough to support her family well.

She lives in a large traditional family with her husband, children and other relatives. She needs to have an increase in her earnings to cover the everyday expenditures of her family. To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a loan of Rs 45,000. She will be using the loan to buy different types of wood to offer a variety of baskets to her customers. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: To buy different types of wood to offer a variety of baskets.

loans.name: Sevak

texts.en:
Sevak is 30 years old. He lives with his parents in Sevan city in Gegharkunik region. Sevak and his father work at the same hotel; he as a security man and his father is a gardener at that hotel. Sevak’s father is very famous gardener in their city, he makes magnificent compositions of small trees and flowers, which perfectly decorate the façade of the hotel. 

Over the last years, Sevak’s patents have been very worried about their son’s marriage and they also greatly want to have grandchildren. Several months ago, Servak surprised them and said that he has a nice bride and they want to become engaged. Now it is high time for their marriage and they want to organize a nice and cheerful wedding party.

Sevak is asking for a loan of 1,000,000 Armenian drams in order to hold his wedding party and also to make his parents' cherished dream come true.

loans.use: to hold his wedding party and also to make his parents' cherished dream come true

loans.name: Marine

texts.en:
Marine is from Sisavan village, where she lives with her husband and son. Her son works in the private sector. Marine and her husband run a farm. Near the village where they live, the couple owns a beautiful orchard where they grow different types of fruit trees (peach, nut, apricot, and apple). Marine also rents a small plot of land where she cultivates watermelon. The harvest they gather is sold at local open markets.

Marine has now requested this loan of 2,300 USD to purchase two oxen and to cover cultivation costs. This is very important for her to improve her farm and earn more agricultural income. Marine hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for two oxen and to cover cultivation costs

loans.name: Liana

texts.en:
Liana is 33 years old, and she lives in Ijevan city in Tavush region. Liana is not married, and she lives with her parents. Her father is retired and receives a pension, and her mother is a housewife. Liana is the only employed person in her family; she works at the credit company at the Ijevan branch as a credit agent. Her parents are running the farm and they are trying somehow to help their daughter solve their family financial problems. They are seriously engaged in swine breeding and they sell pork to local butchers. Despite that Lina works at the credit company, the credit conditions of Nor Horizon and Kiva are very convenient for her.
So she asks for a loan of 1,000,000 Armenian drams in order to make their farm bigger and to buy three more piglets and a lot of animal fodder for the whole farm's cattle.

loans.use: to buy three more piglets and a lot of animal fodder for her cattle

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria es Comerciante de productos agrícolas (papa, tunta, caya). El cual vende en distintas ferias de Achacachi.  Vive en casa su hijo. en la población de Achacachi a una hora y  media de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz. El credito requiere para aumento de capital para su negocio, asi pobra aumentar sus ingresos.

El sueño de Gloria  es ser comerciante mayorista. Asi  es poder brindar a sus hijos el sustento y educación suficiente para que puedan ejercer una profesión  y así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria works selling agriculture products, such as potatoes, tunta [a freeze-dried potato product] and caya [a dehydrated grain]. She sells these products in various markets in Achacachi. She lives in her son’s house in the town of Achacachi, an hour and a half from the city of La Paz. She is requesting this loan to increase the capital of her business and her income. She will buy potatoes and other tubers to sell.

Gloria’s dream is to become a wholesaler, and to be able to give her children support and education so that they can practice a profession and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: buy potatoes and other tubers to sell in her business.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 36-year-old married man from Deir el Balah city. He lives with his wife and four kids; one son and three daughters. Ahmad works as an employee in the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all of the family needs. 

Ahmad also works in his rickshaw where he buys groceries and food and resells them to the supermarkets in his area. It is a good business and it covers part of the family expenses.
 
Ahmad took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy more food and grocery products and resell them at the local market. This will increase his sales and income.
 
Ahmad appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more food and grocery products and resell them at the local market.

loans.name: Rosa Michelle

texts.es:
Rosa es una joven de 18 años, soltera, radica en la ciudad de Santo Domingo, un sector con un clima cálido. 
Actualmente Rosa se dedica al comercio de ropa, vende blusas, shores, ropa interior y carteras, lo realiza ambulante, recorre en pueblos cerca del sector. Cuenta con dos años de experiencia, poco a poco ha ido ahorrando sus ganancias y con esto ha podido darse la educación superior, ahora está estudiando enfermería en una universidad cerca de su domicilio.
Rosa necesita capital para la compra de más mercadería como blusas y shores ya que está próxima la temporada de carnaval, una temporada muy buena para su negocio, además para la compra de una vitrina para poder exhibir sus productos desde casa; por referencias del sector se enteró del trabajo que hace la Fundación y decidió recopilar la información necesaria para acceder a un crédito y pudo lograrlo, hoy en día Rosa agradece a Fundación Alternativa y en especial a Kiva quienes hicieron posible que con este crédito pueda comprar la mercadería necesaria y así poder crecer en su negocio.
texts.en:
Rosa is a young woman of 18 years who lives in Santo Domingo, an area with a hot climate. Rosa is in the clothing business, selling blouses, shorts, underwear and purses. She goes door-to-door in neighborhoods close to her home. She has two years of experience and little by little is saving her earnings. This has allowed her to study. She is studying nursing at a university close to home. 

Rosa needs capital to buy more merchandise like blouses and shorts as carnival time is approaching. This is a good period for business. She also wants to buy a display case so she can display her products at her house. She learned about the work that Fundación Alternativa does and she decided to collect the information she needed to apply for a loan. She was successful. Today Rosa is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and especially Kiva who have made this loan possible so she can buy the clothing she needs to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise and a display case.

loans.name: Sadam

texts.en:
Sadam is 21 years old. He lives with his wife and two daughters in Gaza; one of them attends primary school. He works in a public institution, which is familiar with low salaries.

Sadam applied for a loan from Ryada to repair the kitchen closet, install windows, and pay for plumbing work for the bathroom to prevent the water from leaking, which will help to take a step forward, because he has a shortage of money. He is very grateful to everyone who helps him.

loans.use: to repair the kitchen closet, install windows, and pay for plumbing work for the bathroom.

loans.name: Ata

texts.en:
Ata is a 46-year-old married man from Deir el Balah city. He lives with his wife and five kids; four sons and one daughter. Ata works as an employee at the public sector where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all of the family needs. 

Ata also works in his rickshaw where he buys groceries and food and resells them to the supermarkets in his area. It is a good business and it covers part of the family expenses.
 
Ata took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him buy more food and grocery products and resell them in the local market. This will increase his sales and income.
 
Ata would like to take a bigger loan in the future to buy a bigger car to use it in his business.

Ata appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more food and grocery products and resell them at the local market.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine lives in Shahumyan village in Lori region. She is 46 years old. She is divorced and lives alone. She has two daughters who are already married and live with their families. Narine worked at different factories as a worker, then at different private companies as a baker. At this moment, she also works at a bread factory. As she says, with her small salary alone, she hardly manages to make ends meet, and that is why she wants to start her own small business.
 
In order to start her business, she needs a loan in an amount of 150,000 Armenian Drams(AMD) in order to buy all the raw materials that she will need to make different pastry and bakery products at her home, which she will sell at the local food markets.

loans.use: to buy the needed raw materials to make different pastry and bakery products.

loans.name: Yeghnik

texts.en:
Yeghnik lives in Shaghap village with her husband and 22-year-old son. The family owns a farm. It currently includes livestock (20 cows, 30 calves, 15 sheep, a pig, piglets and 10 chickens). Yeghnik also cultivates wheat and barley. The family works hard to have sustainable farm and make it more profitable. 

Yeghnik uses the milk in cheese production and the cheese she produces and meat are sold at nearby markets. The barn where the family keeps the livestock is damaged and needs to be renovated. Because of financial conditions it is very difficult for Yeghnik and her family to save money for the farm. 

Therefore Yeghnik has applied for this loan of USD 3,000 to be able to renovate the barn and purchase forage for the livestock. 

Yeghnik will be very grateful to lenders for their support.

loans.use: to pay for the renovation of the barn and forage for the livestock

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar is 47 years old and she lives in Sevan city in Gegharkunik region. Gohar has a big, nice family: two sons and a daughter. Her elder son is a student; her second son studies at a college and her daughter is still school-aged. Gohar’s husband is disabled and he receives a pension. 

Gohar has higher education and a specialty in teaching. For 24 years already she has worked at a school as a teacher of physics. Pupils say she is a kind, patient and clever pedagogue, who is always ready to explain once more, to help and to analyze anything that is not clear to any pupil. She also gives paid individual courses of physics at her home.

Gohar is asking for a loan of 300,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a computer which she as well as her children greatly need as a source of information connected with her specialty or just out of interest.

loans.use: to buy a computer which she as well as her children greatly need

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a huge quantity of water and soft drinks to attract more customers.

loans.name: Hatun Rumiyoc Group

texts.es:
La socia Victoria pertenece al banco comunal HATUN RUMIYOC,el banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Victoria tiene 60 años de edad es casada y tiene 06 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de elaboración de tortas para los distintos compromisos que solicitan como matrimonios, fiesta de 15 años de edad, bautizos entre otros, la socia lleva años dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como harina, matequilla, azucar entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
Los socios que salen en la foto adjunta pidieron permiso para llegar tarde a la reunión por motivos de trabajo.
Los demas socios se dedican a la venta de artesania,venta de cosmeticos,produccion de zapatos, periodista, contadora.
texts.en:
Victoria belongs to the "HATUN RUMIYOC" communal bank which is located in the district of Cusco in the province and Department of the same name. Victoria is 60 years old, married and has 6 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of making cakes for the different events like weddings, 15 year old birthdays celebrations, baptisms, etc. Victoria has been in this business for years and things are going well for her thanks to the determination she applies to her work each day. She wants to continue to work in this way to support her family.

Victoria is requesting a loan to buy supplies like flour, lard, sugar, etc. She is grateful for the loan and promises to pay her installments on time. The members that appear in the attached photo asked permission to arrive late due to work commitments. The other members sell handicrafts, sell cosmetics, make shoes and work as a journalist and an accountant.

loans.use: to buy supplies like flour, lard, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es:
Vilma vive en la ciudad del Cusco unicado al sur de Peru, ella es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que se dedica a la preparacion de hamburguesas, sándwich, jugos y también vende todo tipo de productos de snack como por ejemplo gaseosas, dulces, galletas y entre otros. 

Vilma en esta oportunidad requiere el prestamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería como por ejemplo dulces, empanadas, gelatinas, gaseosas, galletas, chocolates y otras cosas más. 

Vilma agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Vilma lives in the city of Cusco, located in the south of Peru. She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who earns her living preparing hamburgers, sandwiches, and juices; she also sells all kinds of snack foods like, for example, sodas, sweets, cookies, and more.

At this time, Vilma needs a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise like sweets, empanadas [savory stuffed pastries], gelatins, sodas, cookies, chocolates, and more.

Vilma is grateful for the opportunity provided by this loan, which will allow her to invest in her business and grow economically.

loans.use: to buy candies, sweets, gelatins, sodas, cookies, chocolates, and more.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is 24 years old and lives in Jinen with his wife. Life conditions prevented him from completing his higher education, so he decided to open a barber shop after studying in this field for five years.
He asked Ryada for this youth loan to buy a barber chair, wax machine and hair dryer for his shop. This will increase the number of clients, and increase his income, which will help him to improve the financial conditions for his family.  
Ahmad is very grateful to everyone who helps him to achieve success in his business with this loan.

loans.use: to buy a barber chair, wax machine and hair dryer for his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy enough rice, oil, onion, etcetera, to increase her sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, pepper, fish, meat, coal, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for her business.

loans.name: Saulo Fernando

texts.es:
El  es Fernando, actualmente tiene  22 años, hace poco se gradué como licenciado en
humanidades con énfasis en español e inglés, no obstante, desde hace dos años ha tenido interés por la carrera de cosmetología y estética integral, particularmente la que ofrece Campa alto.
En el 2011 aproximadamente, tuvo la oportunidad de tomar cursos sobre masajes de relajación, aromaterapia y reiki, estos le sirvieron para notar una falencia que tuvo durante toda la vida como estudiante; ignoramos el cuerpo para casi todo lo que se involucra en la vida cotidiana, se concentra mas en la razón y el raciocinio, que ignora  los cuidados y necesidades del cuerpo  físico. Esto se entremezcla con la vocación como docente, puesto que quiero llevar ese mensaje a otros; debe enseñar, educar y cuidar tanto a la mente como a el  cuerpo.
Escogió este camino y no otro, como el de fisioterapia o medicina, porque la idea de trabajar desde y mediante el cuerpo es muy amena; ayudar a otros con procesos que no involucran directamente la mente, sino el cuerpo, pero aun así, tienen grandes impacto mental en las personas. 

Piensa en la salud como algo muy amplio, trabajar esta parte  lo hace posible desde esta carrera, donde la parte estética involucra lo social y físico, mientras las terapias de relajación lo mental y anímico. 
A futuro, dentro de los planes está fuertemente la idea de establecer un Spa, el cual se enfoque fuertemente en las terapias de relajación y estrés. 

Quiere  poder llevar a muchas personas la idea de un cuerpo saludable, no solo en el exterior, sino también en el interior.
Desde hace un tiempo hace terapias a seres cercanos, también las aplica con el mismo, maderoterapia, masajes, terapia con cristales y gemas, esencias florales. Para finalizar, le gustaría contar con el apoyo, el cual le seria de gran utilidad para acercarse mas al futuro que quiere crear y compartir con otras personas, aunque los recursos económicos  no son bastantes el sabe que con el subsidio que le puede dar kiva se acerca un poco mas a cumplir el sueño que el tanto quiere.
texts.en:
This is Fernando, now 22 years old, who recently graduated with a diploma in Humanities, with emphasis on Spanish and English. Nevertheless, for the last 2 years, he has developed an interest in cosmetology and personal aesthetics, particularly as offered at the Campo Alto Institute.

In 2011, approximately, he had the opportunity to take courses in massage and relaxation, aromatherapy, and reiki. These courses served to help him note a lack he had all his life as a student; we ignore the body for almost all that is involved in daily life. We concentrate more on reason and rationality, while ignoring the care and necessities of the physical body. This combined with his teaching vocation, makes him want to take this message to others. We should be teaching, educating, and caring for the mind and the body.

Fernando chose this road and no other for physiotherapy or medicine, because the idea of working from and through the body is very agreeable. To help others with processes that involved directly not just the mind but the body can have a great mental impact on people. 

Fernando thinks of health as something very broad, and to work in this manner it can be done from his career, where the aesthetics portion involves the social and the physical, while therapies relax the mental and the emotional state. In the future, among his plans is, very strongly, the idea of establishing a spa, with a primary focus on relaxation and stress therapies.

He wants to be able to convey to many people the idea of a healthy body, not only in the exterior but also in the interior.

For some time now, Fernando has been offering therapy to people close to him. He also applies wood therapy, massages, therapies with crystals and gems, and floral essences. In conclusion, he would like to count on support which would be of great utility in drawing closer to the future he wishes to create and share with others, though his economic resources are insufficient. Fernando knows that a subsidy that Kiva can offer will draw him nearer to fulfilling the dream that he wants so much to achieve.

loans.use: to pay a semester of matriculation fees.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: Jorge Luis es una joven emprendedora y trabajador que se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como cuyes, él desde hace varios años pertenece al banco comunal "Siempre Juntos" y en esta oportunidad requiere otro préstamo o adicional para incrementar el capital del negocio y desea comprar más cuyes. Jorge Luis se siente contento por el préstamo y se compromete a pagar las cuotas puntuales y con mucha responsabilidad. Agradece a todos los inversionistas por el préstamo y desea que sigan apoyando a los demás proyectos.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis is enterprising and hardworking. He works raising small animals such as guinea pigs. He has been a member of the communal bank “Siempre Juntos” [“Always Together”] for a number of years now. He is requesting an additional loan to increase the capital of his business by buying more guinea pigs.

Jorge Luis is happy for the loan, and he promises to responsibly make his loan payments on time. He is grateful to all of the lenders for the loan, and he hopes that they will continue supporting other projects.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs.

loans.name: Pedro Juan

texts.es:
Pedro, se acerca nuevamente a nuestra institución en busca de más capital para invertir en la compra de interruptores, tubos (poliducto), fusibles, cables. Para seguir teniéndolos accesorios necesarios para realizar su trabajo.
A Pedro el crédito anterior le ayudo a mantenerse brindando un buen servicio, con lo que su situación económica es mucho más favorable, ya ha cancelado sus deudas y brinda a su familia un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en: Pedro came to our institution again in search of more resources to invest in the purchase of power switches, pipeline tubes, fuses, and cables. These are necessary accessories to complete his work. The previous loan helped Pedro to continue offering good service, and thus his financial situation is more favorable. He has settled his debts and affords his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy power switches, pipeline tubes, fuses, and cables.

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar lives in Lukashin village with her husband, son, daughter-in-law, and two little grandchildren.

The family is engaged in agriculture. The farm that they run includes two cows, a calf, and 30 chickens. Near their house, Gohar also owns an arable land where she cultivates cucumber and grass as forage for the livestock. The income from agricultural business is important for covering the family's basic costs. 

As the winter is almost over and good agricultural season is coming, Gohar would like to expand her farm. She has applied for a loan of USD 3,000 to be able to purchase eight calves and a cow. This will help her enlarge her livestock and increase the income from agribusiness.

Gohar and her whole family hope for your trust and support.

loans.use: to pay for eight calves and a cow.

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Julio de 48 años de edad, estudio hasta  noveno grado, es casado su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene dos hijos uno estudia en la universidad y la niña estudia en la escuela.
Julio se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura y la ganadería trabajo familiar por años. El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar ganado y cerdos para engordarlos y venderlos posteriormente.
Él desea poder trabajar mucho más para darle el estudio a sus hijos y dejarle a su familia capital para poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Julio is 48 years old. He has a 9th grade education and is married. His wife is a homemaker and they have two children. One is studying at the university; their daughter is in school.

Julio earns his living in farming and livestock production, which has been his family's work for years. The loan he is requesting from CrediCampo is for the purchase of cattle and pigs to fatten and later sell. 

Julio hopes to be able to work much more in order to give his children an education and to leave his family with capital so they can continue working.

loans.use: to buy cattle and pigs to fatten and later sell.

loans.name: Léopold

texts.fr: Léopold est un homme de 47 ans, père de famille. il est commerçant dans un marché de la place depuis 15 ans où il vend la friperie de chaussures des jeunes, hommes et des dames (en fonction des saisons et des ballots). à cause de la petitesse de son capital, il est obligé d’aller au déballage chaque week-end pour acheter en détail les vêtements qu'il expose dans son comptoir. Cela ne rapporte pas vraiment d'où l'importance de crédit pour son activité parce qu'il lui permettra d'acheter un ballot mixte. ceci augmentera non seulement ses ventes, mais aussi son bénéfice. il économisera le bénéfice que lui apportera ce crédit pour agrandir sa boutique une boutique .
texts.en: Léopold is a man of 47, father of a family; he has been a merchant in a local market for 15 years and he sells used shoes for young people, men and women, depending on the season and on the contents of the bales he buys. Because of his limited working capital he is obliged to go the place where bales are unpacked each weekend to buy the clothing that he displays in his shop by the piece. This doesn't bring much in, which explains the importance of this loan for his business, since it will allow him to buy a mixed bale of goods. This will grow not only his sales but also his profit. He will save the profit from the use of this loan to extend the size of his stall into a shop.

loans.use: to buy a bale of mixed sorts of shoes

loans.name: Mateo

texts.es:
Mateo es un joven emprendedor, activo y amante de los animales; a sus 22 años de edad tiene su propio negocio, una peluquería canina que inició hace 5 años aproximadamente, en la que, además de prestar los servicios de baño y peluquería, también vende productos alimenticios caninos y juguetes; el oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica, pues desde niño sintió un amor especial por los animales y esto lo impulsó a crear esta unidad productiva; así genera los recursos suficientes para aportar a la economía del hogar.
El crédito solicitado será invertido en la compra de surtido e insumos al por mayor (shampoo, acondicionador, jabón anti pulgas, concentrado, galletas caninas, pelotas y otros), esto le permitirá diversificar su portafolio de productos y así podrá satisfacer los gustos y necesidades de sus clientes y, aumentar las ventas.
Mateo, con su espíritu de superación, siempre se proyecta teniendo su negocio cada vez más grande, con mayor capacidad para atender a sus clientes caninos y ser distribuidor de los productos, así mejorará la calidad de vida propia y aportará un grano de arena para que se sigan protegiendo y cuidando a estos animales indefensos.
texts.en:
Mateo is a young, active entrepreneur who loves animals.  At 22 years old, he has his own business, a dog grooming business that he started about five years ago.  There, in addition to offering bathing and grooming services, he also sells dog food and toys.  He learned this trade in a hands-on manner.  From a young age, he had a strong love for animals, which led him to this career.  Through this business, he earns enough to support his household finances.  

The loan he has requested will be used to purchase an assortment of supplies in bulk (shampoo, conditioner, anti-flea soap, dog food, dog cookies, balls, and other items).  This will allow him to diversify his inventory and satisfy the needs and preferences of his customers, which will increase his sales.

Mateo has a desire to succeed, he always strives to make his business bigger, and increase his ability to tend to his canine clients and to distribute his products.  Through this, he will improve the quality of his life and continue to do his part in protecting and caring for these defenseless animals.

loans.use: purchase an assortment of supplies in bulk (shampoo, conditioner, ant-flea soap, dog food, dog cookies, balls and others).

loans.name: Mirene Pélagie

texts.fr: Mirène est un femme de 31 ans célibataire et mère 4 enfants. Elle est commerçante dans un marché de la place depuis 3 ans où elle vend la friperie es vêtements des jeunes, hommes et des dames (en fonction des saisons et des ballots). à cause de la petitesse de son capital, il est obligé d’aller au déballage chaque week-end pour acheter en détail les vêtements qu'il expose dans son comptoir. Cela ne rapporte pas vraiment d'où l'importance de crédit pour son activité parce qu'il lui permettra d'acheter un ballot mixte. il économisera le bénéfice que lui apportera ce crédit pour agrandir sa boutique de vêtements.
texts.en: Mirène is a young woman of 31, single and the mother of four children. She has been a merchant in a local market for three years and she sells used clothing for young people, men and women (according to the seasons and the contents of the bales she buys). Because her working capital is so limited, she is obliged to go to where bales are unpacked every weekend to buy the garments she displays in her stall by the piece. This doesn't really bring much in, which explains the importance of the loan for her business since it will allow her to buy a mixed bale. She will save the profit that this loan will bring in to grow her clothing stall.

loans.use: to buy a bale of mixed garments

loans.name: Solidario Trabajando Con Cristo Group

texts.es:
Solidario Trabajando con cristo
Doña Margarita es originaria de la aldea Pacorral  tiene 42 años de edad  bajo su responsabilidad están sus 8 hijos menores de edad, ella se dedica a la elaboración de tejidos típicos a mano y a la agricultura.
El esposo de ella trabaja como agricultor y gracias al apoyo de el y de toda su familia  ella sigue adelante con su negocio.
El crédito que ella recibió lo utilizo para comprar mas hilos para sus tejidos y también compro semillas, fertilizantes y fungicidas para su trabajo en la agricultura.
